content:
The chunk is situated within a discussion about modifying camera properties, specifically addressing the technical possibility of altering the lens's nodal point or view direction versus the practical approach of moving the entire camera using NodePath operations.

Although it is possible to change the nodal point or view direction of a lens to some point other than (0, 0, 0) or some direction other than down the +Y axis, it is usually simplest and best just to move the entire camera using the basic NodePath operations like ~.NodePath.set_pos() and ~.NodePath.set_hpr().
